sentences.en: Hydrocarbon migration has always been a nodus of hydrocarbon reservoir formation research.
sentences.cn: 对于油气运移的研究一直都是油气成藏研究中的要点.

sentences.en: Modeling and implementation are the focus and nodus of research on RBAC.
sentences.cn: RBAC的 建模和实现技术是目前RBAC技术研究的热点和难点.

sentences.en: Objective : To evaluate the clinical application of three dimension configuration in lung nodus.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨肺部结节三维重建的应用价值.

sentences.en: The blind separation of convolution mixture signals is a nodus in blind source separation.
sentences.cn: 卷积混叠的盲信号分离是盲源分离问题中的难点.

sentences.en: The choice of good parameter of water pollution model is a nodus in hydraulics.
sentences.cn: 水质模型的参数率定一直是水质预报的难点.
